Metadata.Title: Configure TLS to Use Strong Cipher Suites
Metadata.DirectLink: Configure SSL to Use Strong Cipher Suites

Content.Data:
==What to Do==
Use the IISCrypto tool to configure the TLS cypher suites used by IIS.
==Why==
Choose strong TLS suites to avoid known vulnerabilities in TLS. Weak crypto suites are subject to crypto attacks which will decipher and compromise confidential data.
==How==
Use the free //IISCrypto// tool to choose strong TLS cypher suites:
# **Download //IISCrypto//.** //IISCrypto// may be downloaded at the link at the bottom of this article. # **Run //IISCrypto//.** //IISCrypto// is easy to deploy and has a very simple interface. Download and run //IISCrypto//. # **Chooose your desired compliance standard(s).** //IISCrypto// comes with presets based on common information security standards. Choose the ones that are the most applicable to your situation. In a couple of clicks, your IIS TLS cypher suites should be configured in compliance with the selected standards.
==Additional Resources==
* To download //IISCrypto//, see https://www.nartac.com/Products/IISCrypto/Default.aspx
